rows.label: qev018701_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh, hello. Welcome welcome, to our bronze VVIP
member, yes? You're here to avail yourself of the
Shimmer & Savvy Financial Group's amenities, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0002
rows.name:
Convert miranium into cash, and we will both get rich
and be very very happy, right? Good plan? Yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0003
rows.name: Er, you do like money, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev018701_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell May May that you'd sell your soul for a few credits.

rows.label: qev018701_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev018701_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell May May that money is evil.

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0004
rows.name:
Goodness! Some of you humans give Nopon a run for
their money when it comes to greed, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0005
rows.name:
So in that case, why not bring me 15 pieces of aurorite
and become a silver VVIP member? Good deal, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0006
rows.name:
Really? Huh. I thought that all you humans were so so
much in love with money, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0007
rows.name:
But without credits, you BLADE operatives can't
purchase equipment, right? So maybe you can't
just claim to ignore it either?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0008
rows.name:
Anyway, less platitudes, more platinum, am I right?
Also, I might have a very very nice offer for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0009
rows.name:
If you bring me 15 pieces of aurorite, I'll make you a
silver VVIP member, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0010
rows.name:
Your exchange rate will go way way up,
and you'll be much much richer. Happier too, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0011
rows.name:
Oh! Good! I'm very happy, yes? So good luck and
come back soon with the aurorite and all that, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0012
rows.name:
That aurorite will let me build another marvelous
alchemy engine, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0013
rows.name:
And that will let us both make much much more
money, won't it? So good luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0014
rows.name:
With FrontierNav expanding, more and more and more
miranium is coming in to New LA, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0015
rows.name:
That's a business opportunity, right?
But I need aurorite to build another alchemy engine
and expand my business, don't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0016
rows.name:
More miranium being converted into resources and
materials means much much more money for all,
doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0017
rows.name:
Welcome welcome, to our bronze VVIP member.
How can the Shimmer & Savvy Financial Group
be at your service today?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0018
rows.name:
Did you find the aurorite yet? Yes? No? Maybe?
We need to make piles and piles of money together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0019
rows.name:
Yes! This is what I need to make another alchemy
engine, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0020
rows.name:
Many thanks. From today forth, you're a silver VVIP
member complete with a silver exchange rate![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0021
rows.name:
So let's keep converting miranium into materials and
resources that we can sell for credits and drive up the
SSFG's profits even further, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0022
rows.name: Maybe we can even turn me into NLA's richest citizen?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept Conditionally

rows.label: qev018701_SEL0031
rows.name:
Tell May May that you will continue
to help her if she helps you.

rows.label: qev018701_JNK0040
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev018701_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell May May to make her own damn money.

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0023
rows.name:
Yay! Let's save up a mountain of money together!
All of the money forever, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0024
rows.name:
Well, time is money, no? But so is miranium,
once I make another of my alchemy engines.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0025
rows.name: How sad. Very very tragic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018701_MSG0026
rows.name:
Well, I still hope all our VVIP members find happiness,
don't I? And also much much more miranium, yes?[ST:wait ]
